page.title: 02****CLUBS IN PRESTATYN****
page.content: In{PRESTATYN}there are various clubs such as: {Cubs,Scouts,Brownies,Guides,PHAB ,Foot {ball,Tennis,Cricket,Golf,Sailing,B.M.X {.,Bible,Sunday School& Rambling.PHAB is a club for physically handicapped & abled bodied people to meet & play games.The youth football club is called the Wanderers & there is also the Prestatyn Town Football Club.In the{B.M.X.}club the cyclists do daring tricks on their specially designed, lightweight bicycles.{B.M.X.}means {Bicycle Motor Cross.}Members of the { {Rambling}club go out for walks in the woods & on the mountains.In Sunday School & the Bible club people of all age groups meet & then the person in charge reads them a Bible story.They also discuss religious matters. { { }
